Base Description: You have strange lapses of memory You often:
Strong: forget friends and family.

Base Description: You are a classic manic/depressive, prone to fits of erratic, up moods punctuated with severe terrifying depressions. You are often
Strong: liable to lie around and mope.
Severe: Liable to run around frenetically risking life and limb or sink into a miserable stupor.

Base Description: You believe things that are not real. You may hear voices, think aliens are after you, or that you are God. You will
Strong: risk hospitalization, bodily harm or financial/social ruin.

Base Description: You hate yourself, and will go out of your way to injure youself. To do this, you may:
Strong: seek minor physical abuse.

Base Description: You have a phobia; and unreasoning fear of some common thing, such as dogs, heights, sounds or color. When faced with your phobia, you feel:
Strong: paralysing fear.

Base Description: (just because you think they're after you...). You think you have enemies, everywhere. Sometimes you are focused on one foe, other times, there may be legions. You react to your paranoia by:
Strong: compulsively working on defenses against them.
Severe: risking incarceration, bodily harm, social or financial ruin to stop them.

Base Description: You're two, two, TWO people in one! [Referee controls this personality, has stat sheet for it, etc.]. Your other self:
Strong: is neutral to you
Extreme: dangerous to you in actions or deeds.

Base Description: Ow wow! you're just naturally spacy. In general, you:
Strong: misplace or forget to do important things.
Severe: misplace or forget to deal with dangerous things.
Extreme: dangerously oblivious to everything; the Referee never asks you to make a perception roll unless you request it.

Base Description: You're just irritable, all the time. When your temper flares:
Mild: You'll risk embarrasment, or financial loss.
Strong: you'll risk incarceration, bodily harm or financial/social ruin.

Base Description: You lack nerve, especially in combat. When faced with danger:
Mild: you tremble at anything you imagine as danger.
Strong: you freeze up and can't react.
Severe: you try to run away as far as possible.

Base Description: You can't get that special (to you) person or thing out of your mind. You:
Mild: talk about it all the time and will risk embarrassment, or financial loss over it.
Strong: you'll risk incarceration, bodily harm or financial/social ruin over it.
Severe: you'll risk life & limb over it.

Base Description: You hate dealing with others. You:
Mild: refuse to speak to new people.
Strong: avoid all interactions with new people.
Severe: will physically remove self from situations involving new people.

Base Description: You just hate to give in to anyone. To prove you're right:
Mild: You'll risk embarrassment, or financial loss.
Strong: you'll risk incarceration, boldy harm or financial/social ruin.

Base Description: You can't control your fighting rage - you rabidly:
Strong: attack anyone in range except friends.
Extreme: attack anyone in range and won't stop until forcibly subdued.

Base Description: Things never go your way; you have constant disasters. Travel and adventure only hold for you:
Strong: costly or dangerous misfortunes.

Base Description: You are either younger than usual or older; this is reflected in your stats:
Mild: very older/younger: Reduce all stats except Mental Group by 1.
Strong: very old/young: Reduce all stats except Mental Group by 2.
Severe: Extremely old: Reduce all stats except Mental Group by 3.

Base Description: You see letters and numbers as a jumble, or reversed. This means you:
Strong: cannot read or write.

Base Description: You fall into convulsive fits that incapacitate you. What sets off the fit (as determined by the Referee) is:
Strong: common.

Base Description: Ouch! that hurt! You're missing: 1 or more fingers.
Strong: an arm.

Base Description: You are hard of hearing. Generally to make a hearing-based Perception check, you will need:
Mild: to beat a Target Number 4 points higher than everyone else's.
Strong: a hearing aid just to hear at all.

Base Description: You are unable to get around normally. Your Movement:
Strong: is reduced by half.
Severe: is reduced to dragging by arms at a MOVE of 1.
Extreme: nonexistent; you’re a total quadriplegic; unable to move below the neck.

Base Description: Your eyesight is impaired in some way.You are:
Strong: in need of glasses.

Base Description: You are prone to uncontrollable changes. These may be physical or mental (depending on what you negotiate with the Referee of your game). What sets off the change is:
Strong: common.

Base Description: Your voice is somehow damaged. When you speak, you can:
Strong: only make sounds, but cannot speak.

Base Description: You're susceptable to a certain situation or substance and take extra damage when exposed to it. The substance or situation is:
Strong: common.

Base Description: You are harmed or take damage from a certain situation or substance that is harmless to most people. The substance or situation is:
Strong: common.

Base Description: You are a figure in the media limelight; you can't make a move without getting attention.
Mild: You are newsworthy and your activities rate an article if a reporter is nearby.
Strong: You frequently make headlines and people always notice your actions on the street.
Severe: Your every action makes news and you have reporters following you everywhere

Base Description: People "know" about you. At least, everyone's heard a story or two, even if untrue. When you are mentioned or seen, you are:
Strong: always recognized.

Base Description: You are trying to hide your activites under a secret identity or other smoke screen. You currently are:
Mild: living a normal life, unnoticed by anyone.
Strong: are bothered by a single person trying to uncover your real identity.
Severe: everyone’s trying to uncover your real identity.

Base Description: Money is hard to come by for you, harder than for most. You are, financially-wise:
Mild: poor, with just enough for a bed and a few meager meals.
Strong: dead Broke and probably on the street with barely enough to eat.
Severe: in debt, with others actively seeking to collect what little you have.

Base Description: People just can’t stand you. Maybe it’s the bad breath or the nose picking, but they find you:
Strong: disgusting.

Base Description: You are part of an oppressed or otherwise downtrodden group. In your society, you are
Mild: snubbed; others ignore or refuse to deal with you.
Strong: oppressed; there are laws controlling where you live, work or can travel.
Extreme: enslaved; you’re treated as property and can be sold or mistreated at will.

Base Description: You stand out and are noticed in any crowd, with features that are:
Strong: concealable with Disguise or Performance skills.

Base Description: You’re not a local, and stand out like a sore thumb, attracting attention both unwelcome and possibly dangerous. You are obviously:
Strong: from a very distant place.
Severe: never before seen in these parts.

Base Description: What can they do to you?
Strong: As powerful as you?.
Extreme: Have access to powerful weapons, powers or hardware.

Base Description: How far can they reach?
Mild: Limited to single town or area.
Strong: Limited to a single country.

Base Description: What do they want from you?
Strong: You are being hunted for capture or imprisonment.

Base Description: These are the personal rules you will not break, no matter what. A Code of Honor might be a code against killing, never attacking from behind, or never suffering an insult without an answer in blood. To keep your Code, you will:
Strong: risk bodily harm or financial ruin.

Base Description: You always do the Right Thing, and follow a higher Moral Code towards those you feel responsible for. You will do this:
Strong: for a special group/organization.

Base Description: This is a promise you must keep, no matter what. It could be to protect someone, follow an ideal, or just get that stupid Ring into that distant volcano. To fulfill this promise, you’ll:
Strong: risk bodily harm or financial ruin.

Base Description: These are those who need your protection and help. They could include children, family, or friends. Generally, they are:
Strong: challenged, or otherwise weaker than you.
Severe: have special problems, requirements or dangers associated with them.

Base Description: You must have a particular substance or situation or you will suffer severe mental or physical duress. The substance/situation you need is:
Strong: uncommon.

Base Description: You always tell the truth, even if it hurts. To be honest, you’ll even:
Mild: risk expulsion, embarrassment, or financial loss.
Strong: risk bodily harm or financial/social ruin.

Base Description: You just can’t help yourself; you always jump into things without thinking. To follow a whim, you’ll:
Strong: risk bodily harm, social or financial ruin.

Base Description: You’re bigoted and intolerant of those who are different from you. When you encounter them, you are:
Strong: rude and verbally abusive.
Extreme: abusive even at risk of life and limb.

Base Description: You are jealous in the extreme. Towards the one you “love”, you are:
Strong: confrontative and accusatory.

Base Description: You steal things continuously. You can’t help it; you’ll even:
Strong: risk bodily harm or financial/social ruin.

Base Description: You can’t resist grabbing or pawing someone you find attractive, or at least making lewd comments. You’ll even:
Mild: risk expulsion, embarrassment, or financial loss.
Strong: risk bodily harm or financial or social ruin.
